plot: Patrick Roopnarine and his Son are barbers in New Cross, London. Their old style barbershop is like a small haven in the busy New Cross Road.
title: Patrick & Son Unique Style
plot_es: Patrick Roopnarine and his Son are barbers in New Cross, London. Their old style barbershop is like a small haven in the busy New Cross Road.
plot_en: Patrick Roopnarine and his Son are barbers in New Cross, London. Their old style barbershop is like a small haven in the busy New Cross Road.
